verses.name: Psalms 114:1
verses.text: Alleluja.   Dilexi, quoniam exaudiet Dominus  vocem orationis me√¶.

verses.name: Psalms 114:2
verses.text: Quia inclinavit aurem suam mihi,  et in diebus meis invocabo.

verses.name: Psalms 114:3
verses.text: Circumdederunt me dolores mortis ;  et pericula inferni invenerunt me.  Tribulationem et dolorem inveni,

verses.name: Psalms 114:4
verses.text: et nomen Domini invocavi :  o Domine, libera animam meam.

verses.name: Psalms 114:5
verses.text: Misericors Dominus et justus,  et Deus noster miseretur.

verses.name: Psalms 114:6
verses.text: Custodiens parvulos Dominus ;  humiliatus sum, et liberavit me.

verses.name: Psalms 114:7
verses.text: Convertere, anima mea, in requiem tuam,  quia Dominus benefecit tibi :

verses.name: Psalms 114:8
verses.text: quia eripuit animam meam de morte,  oculos meos a lacrimis,  pedes meos a lapsu.
